import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "../App.css"; const App = () => { const [slideIndex, setSlideIndex] = useState(0); const slides = [ "https://d1sl07a7h3d3fr.cloudfront.net/admin/store/pothys/banner/Final+5.jpg", "https://d1sl07a7h3d3fr.cloudfront.net/admin/store/991fba9e-84cc-4c71-9004-41d30e4eec5b-Final4.jpg", "https://d1sl07a7h3d3fr.cloudfront.net/admin/store/7d26cbfb-6d99-46d8-9406-a5a0c43c5854-pothysnatchiyar.jpeg" ]; useEffect(() => { const intervalId = setInterval(() => { setSlideIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex + 1) % slides.length); }, 3000); return () => clearInterval(intervalId); // Clean up interval on component unmount }, []); const handlePrevSlide = () => { setSlideIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex - 1 + slides.length) % slides.length); }; const handleNextSlide = () => { setSlideIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex + 1) % slides.length); }; return (
